content:
I'm glad you're enjoying "Stranger Things"! I'm a large language model, I don't have personal experiences or watch TV shows, but I've been trained on a vast amount of text data, including information about popular culture, including TV shows like "Stranger Things".

It's great that you're enjoying the new season! The show has received widespread critical acclaim for its nostalgic value, engaging storyline, and lovable characters. If you're already 7 episodes in, you're probably hooked! Do you have a favorite character or storyline in the show?

By the way, if you're still experiencing issues with your Hulu subscription, feel free to provide more details about the error message you're seeing or the specific problem you're experiencing. I'll do my best to help you troubleshoot the issue or point you in the right direction for a solution.
